title: 3 Bd / 2 Bth Duplex Down in 2 unit walk up (quiet street). Garage!
posting_body: Spacious 3 bed, 2 bath, duplex-down owner's unit on a beautiful tree-lined street in south Evanston, close to the Main Street Metra/Purple Line stops.

The first floor of the unit includes a fully-updated kitchen with granite counter-tops, stainless steel appliances, and garbage disposal, separate dining room and living room, two large bedrooms, plus a bonus room.
Lower level was completely refinished in 2014 and includes spacious, carpeted family-room, gorgeous master bath with fabulous shower, and master bedroom with large walk-in closet.
Unit also includes a bonus sun-room with heated floors and a professionally-landscaped rear garden and paver patio that connects to a covered garage.
Free laundry and ample storage available in the building.

Accessibility to public transportation makes this an ideal property if you are commuting to downtown Chicago or downtown Evanston (steps from the 201 bus - travels to downtown Evanston and Northwestern, Old Orchard Mall, and to the Howard redline; short distance to Metra and Main st. or South Blvd el station).
Close to restaurants, grocery stores, parks, & shops.
Part of the Ridgeville Park District!
Do not miss this truly remarkable rental unit!
Please contact John for a video or in person tour!
